statements: DELETE FROM CrimeIncidenceData WHERE id = 100 AND date_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM CrimeIncidenceData WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery' AND location LIKE '%Main Street%';
DELETE FROM crime_incidents WHERE incident_date < '2021-01-01' AND crime_type = 'Robbery';
DELETE FROM crime_location WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM CrimeTypes WHERE crime_type_id > 10 AND description LIKE '%robbery%';
DELETE FROM crime_incident WHERE offense_type = 'Theft' AND location = 'Downtown' AND incident_date = '2022-01-15' AND suspect = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM crime_incident WHERE suspect = 'Jane Smith' AND offense_type = 'Vandalism';
DELETE FROM crime_incident WHERE offense_type = 'burglary' AND incident_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM crime_incident WHERE location = '123 Main St' OR (offense_type = 'vandalism' AND suspect = 'John Doe');
